snippet.title: Castle Crashers DLC Announcement: Painter Boss Paradise
snippet.description:
Let's create powerful Castle Crashers characters together! Announcing the Castle Crashers Painter Boss Paradise DLC! Create new characters using the Steam Workshop and play as Paint Junior!

The paid DLC will include:
- Steam workshop capabilities: create your own knight skins, choose your magic, and share with the world!
- New official character: play as Paint Junior, use your imagination, and create powerful art to vanquish your foes!
- New player and weapon artwork for all official playable characters (with an option to toggle on or off).

Get INSPIRED and let us know what POWERFUL characters you'll create with the tool!

Music Credits:
"Jumper" and "The Show" by @WaterflameMusic 
"Creepy Frog" by William Stamper

Castle Crashers on Steam → https://store.steampowered.com/app/204360/Castle_Crashers/
Join our Discord → https://beh.gg/discord

Castle Crashers®
©2008 The Behemoth. All Rights Reserved

Castle Crashers®, The Behemoth®, and The Behemoth logo are trademarks of The Behemoth in the U.S. and other countries.
